actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the continued funding for operation and maintenance of the Bethune Museum and Archives.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for FY 1990 through 1992 to continue funding the operation and maintenance of the museum and archives at the Mary McLeod Bethune Council House, a national historic site in Washington, D.C., which acknowledges the contributions of Mary McLeod Bethune, an educator and presidential advisor, and other African-American women to this country.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the continued funding for operation and maintenance of the Bethune Museum and Archives.
